description.displayText: Sindy was an incredible help with my aging grandmother who suffers from dementia. She has been a huge asset and also a lovely addition in our home. It's easy for people with Dementia to be ignored, but Sindy has always spoken directly to my grandmother and engaged her. It would be an understatement to say that she's been a godsend. Also my grandmother loves her! The only reason we are parting ways is that my grandmother is moving across the country for logistical reasons. I honestly cannot recommend this wonderful woman strongly enough!

description.displayText: Sindy has cared for my daughter along with doing housekeeping for five years. She is highly responsible and I trust her completely. Most importantly, she is a very kind and loving person. I highly recommend her!
description.originalText: Sindy has cared for my daughter along with doing housekeeping for five years. She is highly responsible and I trust her completely. Most importantly, she is a very kind and loving person. I highly recommend her!

description.displayText: I have known Sindy for many years. Sindy is a kind and caring type of person and would give her all when it comes to caring for other people. She is very honest, trustworthy and a hard worker. Please feel free to contact me if you have any further questions! Thanks!
description.originalText: I have known Sindy for many years. Sindy is a kind and caring type of person and would give her all when it comes to caring for other people. She is very honest, trustworthy and a hard worker. Please feel free to contact me if you have any further questions! Thanks!

description.displayText: I have known Sindy all her life.  She is a responsible and caring woman with the common sense, compassion, and skills necessary to properly care for another person.  At the same time, she is interesting and entertaining and would also provide stimulating companionship.  I would recommend her strongly for employment.
